dialogue.introduction: I'm the Ayanami-class destroyer Oboro. I won't lose to anyone. Probably.
dialogue.library_intro: 7th ship of the Ayanami-class, Oboro. Laid down in the Sasebo Naval Arsenal. I participated in the Southern operations. Hot places are better, aren't they? Kiss...? No, not that, the cold Kiska Island... I don't want to get close to that... I hope.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral, I'm waiting here... I'm waiting here, hey!... Yes.
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, am I of use to you? Well then, that's great...
dialogue.equipment1: You're making Oboro stronger? I see.
dialogue.equipment2: Oboro could do it, even without the modernisation...
dialogue.supply: You're making Oboro stronger? I see~
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Repairs... they're necessary, so that I can fight again.
dialogue.docking_complete: A ship has returned from the dock.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new comrade? I don't really care...
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet is back, I wonder what the result is?
dialogue.battle_start: I'm not full of hot air!
dialogue.night_battle: I told you, I'm not full of hot air!
dialogue.mvp: Oboro did good? Ah.. ye-yeah! I'll do my best next time too!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: No... not yet! I will not sink!
dialogue.sunk: Well... I am a destroyer... aren't I?
dialogue.christmas_2014: Oboro likes Christmas! I think it's a nice thing.
dialogue.new_year_2015: Admiral, Happy New Year! Please look after me this year too.
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Ah....I finally got to wear my swimsuit & this.... It's alright, it'll be fixed if I take a bath... P-probably.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Admiral? It is mid-summer! Oboro really likes this season. Mr. Crab is happy too! Look!
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn... It's a fairly calm season. What kind of book are you reading, admiral?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Admiral, perhaps December came too fast. The 7th Destroyer Division is also doing its best.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun, probably. Oboro will do her best, throwing the beans! Eii!
